name: freeCulture
notification: We have discovered cultural artifacts in the ruins! (+2000 culture)

name: freePop
notification: We have found survivors in the ruins! Population added to [cityName].

name: freeGold
notification: We have found a stash of [goldAmount] Gold in the ruins!

name: freeAncientTech
notification: We have discovered the lost technology in the ruins!
uniques: [3] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Ancient era] <during the [Ancient era]>

[2] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Medieval era] <during the [Medieval era]>
[2] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Renaissance era] <during the [Renaissance era]>

name: unitTraining
notification: Our unit was trained by nearby residents!

name: unitUpgrade
notification: Our unit finds advanced weaponry hidden in the ruins!
uniques: This Unit upgrades for free including special upgrades

name: crudelyDrawnMap
notification: We have found a crudely-drawn map in the ruins!
uniques: Reveal up to [All] [All] within a [600] tile radius

name: holySymbols
notification: We have found holy symbols in the ruins, giving us a deeper understanding of religion! (+[faithAmount] Faith)
uniques: Gain enough Faith for a Pantheon

name: ancientProphecy
